name: InboxAI
description: An open-source email domain authentication, real-time deliverability, and email address rectification platform that ensures accurate delivery, compliance, and prospect targeting.

funding.description: Funding will help us build critical components like domain auto-authentication (SPF, DKIM, DMARC), real-time deliverability metrics, and a proprietary open-source module for prospect email rectification that identifies correct email addresses using passive bounce signal aggregation and pattern modeling.

sustainability.plan: We're building a freemium, API-first email intelligence platform with community contributions encouraged. Enterprise-grade versions will include advanced analytics, compliance automation, and CRM integrations via SaaS. Funding will ensure our core deliverability + email rectification engine remains free and open-source.
sustainability.maintenance_model: Active development by founding team with roadmap published quarterly. Community contributions via GitHub Issues and Pull Requests. Security fixes and core performance improvements under LTS commitments.

impact.adoption: Initial traction includes 100+ beta users and integrations with Mailchimp, SendGrid, and HubSpot CRM. Our real-time bounce correction and inbox placement diagnostics engine has already improved open rates by up to 28% in pilot programs.
impact.differentiator: We are the only open-source solution combining domain authentication, inbox deliverability scoring, and AI-powered email rectification (auto-correction of invalid email addresses using behavioral data & bounce patterns).
